title: Knee-to-chest
preparation: Lie on your back on a comfortable surface with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
execution: Gently bring one knee up toward your chest, using both hands to pull it in closer. Keep the other foot flat on the floor. Hold the position for 15-30 seconds, feeling the stretch in your lower back and glutes. Slowly release the first leg and repeat with the other leg.
exampleAlt: Gif of woman doing knee-to-chest movement
